post.description: Place a new order, and move all items in the cart to the order

get.description: View all items in the shopping cart

post.description: Add a book to the shopping cart

put.description: Update the quantity of a book in the shopping cart

delete.description: Remove a book from the shopping cart

user_id.description: ID of the user who placed the order

id.description: ID of the shopping cart item

user_id.description: ID of the user who owns the shopping cart

book_id.description: ID of the book in the shopping cart
